评论详情: The shirt fits as expected and it’s pretty comfortable and well made. Looks great!
Bought this as a christmas present and it was very cute! Oversized fit!
Such a cute cat t-shirt for cute lovers and those who love cat memes, but it runs small! Make sure to size up if possible!
Accurate size! A bit baggy. Feels like your average t shirt.
Cute shirt. Graphic is not screen printed, so high quality print at the cost if being somewhat uncomfortable.

评论概述: The print quality is not good

评论详情: Very cute shirt, however...I wore once, washed per instructions, and its design is cracking and peeling. I got it for a promo night at a bar for a night out, so it was for a specific look. So, im not too pressed and plan on donating it. But if you plan to get this and wear it more than once, id be weary.

i can usually wear a medium/L if i want it to fit properly, i bought a 3xl to be baggy and it fits like a medium. Everything about the shirt feels and looks good but if you need a 1xl+ it’s wayyy to small
Runs extremely small and comes with a smell, but at least it’s soft.
